vote.title: Ratify Supplemental Agreement No. 2 to the engineering services contract with Wiss, Janney, Elstner, Associates, Inc. to inspect and prepare plans, specifications and estimates for the emergency repairs of the Fitzhugh Bridge, south of Fair Park, TxDOT Bridge 18-057-09F4-60-011 - Not to exceed $45,000.00, from $246,111.00 to $291,111.00 - Financing: Street and Alley Improvement Fund
